name: ImageGallery

types.name: Model
types.comment: The model of an image gallery

types.name: Msg
types.comment: The type of messages to interact with an image gallery

values.name: defaultView
values.comment: Default view for an image gallery
values.type: Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageGallery.Model -> Html.Html ImageGallery.Msg

values.name: defaultViewSelected
values.comment: Default view of the currently selected image of an image gallery
values.type: Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageGallery.Model -> Html.Html ImageGallery.Msg

values.name: defaultViewThumbs
values.comment: Default view of the thumbnails of an image gallery
values.type: Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageGallery.Model -> Html.Html ImageGallery.Msg

values.name: init
values.comment: Initialize an empty model of an image gallery

values.name: update
values.comment: Update the gallery depending on the message
values.type: ImageGallery.Msg -> ImageGallery.Model -> ( ImageGallery.Model , Platform.Cmd.Cmd ImageGallery.Msg , Maybe.Maybe ImageCollection.Key )

values.name: viewThumbs
values.comment: View the thumbnails of an image gallery with a specific image viewer
values.type: Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageCollection.ImageViewer ImageGallery.Msg -> ImageGallery.Model -> Html.Html ImageGallery.Msg

name: ImageCollection

aliases.name: ImageViewer
aliases.comment: Alias for readability in type definitions
aliases.type: Maybe.Maybe Image.Class -> Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageCollection.Key -> Image.Model -> VirtualDom.Node msg

aliases.name: Key
aliases.comment: The key type to access images in the collection

types.name: Model
types.comment: The model for a collection of images.

types.name: Msg
types.comment: The type of messages to interact with image collections.

values.name: defaultView
values.comment: A simple default viewer putting `` tags one after the other.

values.name: init
values.comment:
Initialize the model of a collection of images
with the default size of image views.

    (model, msg) = init (Just (320, 240))
values.type: Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ( ImageCollection.Model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd ImageCollection.Msg )

values.name: view
values.comment:
The view of an image collection.
One can define a class for the `<div>` containing the collection,
a special function detailing the view of each image of the collection,
a class for each image tag,
and a default size for the images.

    viewer : Maybe Class -> Maybe (Int, Int) -> Key -> Image.Model -> Node msg
    viewer class size key imageModel =
        Image.view Image.ImgTag class size imageModel

    collectionNode =
        view (Just "my-collection") viewer Nothing (Just (320, 240)) model
values.type: Maybe.Maybe Image.Class -> ImageCollection.ImageViewer msg -> Maybe.Maybe Image.Class -> Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageCollection.Model -> VirtualDom.Node msg

values.name: viewOne
values.comment: View only one image of the collection
values.type: Image.TagType -> Maybe.Maybe Image.Class -> Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> ImageCollection.Key -> ImageCollection.Model -> VirtualDom.Node msg

name: Image

aliases.name: Class
aliases.comment:
For readability purpose in type definitions.
Refers to the class attribute of html tags.

types.name: Msg
types.comment: The type of messages the Image module may use.

types.name: TagType
types.comment: A type specifying if the image is going to be displayed in a classic `` tag or inside a `

values.name: defaultView
values.comment: Default view for an image. It is an `` tag using default class "image" and the size of the image.

values.name: init
values.comment:
Initialize an image with its url, width and height.

    (model, msg) = init "img/cute_cat.png" 320 240
values.type: String -> Int -> Int -> ( Image.Model, Platform.Cmd.Cmd msg )

values.name: size
values.comment: Return the size of an Image

values.name: view
values.comment: View an image, depending on its location. -- Get the image in an `` tag with a size of 320x240 and the class "my-image". viewNode = view ImgTag (Just "my-image") (Just (320, 240)) model
values.type: Image.TagType -> Maybe.Maybe Image.Class -> Maybe.Maybe ( Int, Int ) -> Image.Model -> VirtualDom.Node msg
